items.content_html: Very lightweight ES6 Module for displaying items in a flex-based masonry layout without third party dependencies. The grid layout uses the CSS flexbox feature. No absolute positioning. Offsets are implemented with CSS transform style (translateY).
items.title: offensichtbar-codestock/es6-flex-masonry-grid: Very lightweight ES6 Module for displaying items in a flex-based masonry layout without third party dependencies. The grid layout uses the CSS flexbox feature. No absolute positioning. Offsets are implemented with CSS transform style (translateY).

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
